data.text: @trilobite_1970 @MalathyIyerTOI True,  tests are dipping... Only when a new variant observed will be rise in the cases with these low number of testing or else increasing death rates (which is hard)
@MalathyIyerTOI The three waves India has seen. Third wave ending. https://t.co/mKYMdukLAg

@MalathyIyerTOI Are the testing numbers dipping or remaining the same? 

Should every state need an optimum daily test numbers to catch spikes and  significant variations?
